variants.explanation: Read the limit, echo it, handle the non-positive case immediately, then iterate from 1 to limit building the series and accumulating the sum. Spaces are added between numbers after the first entry.
keyPoints: Guard limit <= 0 first so the remainder of the code assumes a positive range.
Initialize sum to 0 and update it inside the loop as you print each value.
Add a space before values after the first to keep spacing correct.
